Title: Designates revenue collected by the opioid excise tax for the New York state drug treatment and public education fund
Summary: Designates all taxes, interest and penalties collected by the opioid excise tax for the New York state drug treatment and public education fund.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to designating revenue collected by the opioid excise tax for the New York state drug treatment and public education fund
